attributes.action: Guaranteed response to a job applicaiton
attributes.additional_details:
Too many people are applying for jobs and never hearing back. Any job advertised should be covered by law that all unsuccessful applications should be notified so.

Companies failing to respond to people trying to get a job is nothing short of a disgrace, a response is a common courtesy.

Bringing in legislation that requires any business registered to trade in the UK must provide a response within 1 month of the vacancy being filled to any person who applied
